thread.title: BRIEF-Shandong Ruyi Investment Holding To Acquire Majority Stake In Bally International ‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Ruyi Investment Holding To Acquire Majority Stake In Bally International ‍​

organizations.name: brief-shandong ruyi investment holding to acquire majority stake in bally international ‍​ feb

text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) -
* JAB HOLDING CO - SHANDONG RUYI INVESTMENT HOLDING TO ACQUIRE A MAJORITY STAKE IN BALLY INTERNATIONAL A.G. ‍​
* JAB HOLDING CO - UNDER TERMS OF DEAL, JAB TO RETAIN MINORITY INTEREST IN BALLY WHILE BALLY'S MANAGEMENT TEAM WILL REINVEST ALONGSIDE SHANDONG RUYI ‍​ Source text : bit.ly/2EwVXaY
